A rescue owned, non-profit veterinary hospital that provides high-quality medical care to animals in need. We are passionate about helping animals in our community and believe that every pet deserves access to affordable and compassionate veterinary care.  

Our hospital is staffed by a team of experienced veterinarians, technicians, and support staff who are committed to providing the best possible care for our patients. We offer a wide range of services, including wellness exams, vaccinations, spay and neuter, general surgery, orthopedic surgery, and dental care.  In addition to providing medical care to the pets in our community, we also have a special commitment to caring for the animals that are a part of our rescue organization. These animals often come to us with a variety of medical needs and our team works tirelessly to provide them with the care and attention that they need. 

Our hospital is more than just a clinic- it's a place where animals receive the care and compassion they deserve. We believe that every animal deserves a chance to live a happy and healthy life.  We are proud to be a part of a community that is dedicated to making a difference in the lives of pets and their owners.  We are always looking for talented and dedicated individuals to join our team. If you share our passion for animal welfare and want to make a difference, we would love to hear from you!
